name: Tchermobyl Killer 2000 v1
description:
This game was developed during UPsiJam.

This game is coded in Java with libGDX. All textures assets are HOME MADE :)

This game is a platform game where the player's goal is to avoid the explosion of a nuclear power plant.

To help you in this task, you have a gun that allows you to reverse the gravity of enemies. 

And some suprises could happend...

Guide commands (Keyboard and Mouse)

  • Move forward : D
  • Go back : A
  • Jump : Space bar
  • Shoot : Left/right click mouse

Guide game : 

Your mission is to avoid the explosion of a nuclear power plant. For that, you need to lift the lever. But be careful, if you take too much time or receives too much radition, it's game over.

Portals / Holes :  You need to get the ennemis into the portals or the holes for killed them.

Mirror :  If you want to change your own gravity, all you need to do is to shoot into a mirror and gets touch by the bullet.

You can find the project on GitLab : https://gitlab-etu.ing.he-arc.ch/simon.plumey/tchermobyl-killer-2000-v1/
